# Building materials

Design and create materials for your 3D assets in Reality Composer Pro.

## RealityKit materials

- **Applying RealityKit materials to your assets**: Work with materials in Reality Composer Pro to enhance the appearance of your model.

## Shader Graph

- **Designing materials with Shader Graph**: Create realistic materials with Shader Graph’s node editor in Reality Composer Pro.
- **Loading entities with ShaderGraph materials**: Bring entities that contain materials created with Reality Composer Pro for use in your visionOS app.
- **Creating a Fresnel outline effect with Shader Graph**: Highlight a model by adding an outline effect.
- **Creating a vertex displacement material with Shader Graph**: Animate the vertices of a mesh over time with 3D Perlin noise by creating a Shader Graph material.
- **Correcting normals after vertex displacement with Shader Graph**: Approximate new vertex normals for materials that displace a mesh’s vertices.

## Related Documentation

- **ShaderGraph**: Create custom materials and effects for 3D content in Reality Composer Pro.
